tool_description: An API showing Covid-19 related news in Nigeria by the Nigerian Dailies.
name: Covid-19 News in Nigeria
title: Covid-19 News in Nigeria

api_list.name: Get Single Covid-19  news from the dailies
api_list.description: Get Covid-19 news about Nigeria and the economy from single Nigeria Dailies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-news-in-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com/news/leadership"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-news-in-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-news-in-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-news-in-nigeria.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all covid-19 news and sustainable economy growth in Nigeria
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all related covid-19 news and government and individual efforts on sustaining and managing the economy by all the Nigeria News Dailies.

        }

print(response.json())
